activities:
CME is an applications services provider (ASP). It makes available on-line software functionality to commercial clients who may be transferring HR-related information of Switzerland-based and EU-based personnel, or who may be transferring customer personal data. 
CME does not control personal information belonging to its clients.  It only collects Switzerland-based, EU-based personnel and customer personal data from its clients, not directly from individuals.  And it only uses the personal data for limited purposes, i.e., in furtherance of providing its services to clients.  To the extent that CME is subject to any EU privacy regime, it is in its capacity as a data processor.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Malta, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
